Package com.gcep.data

Class ListsDataService

java.lang.Object
com.gcep.data.ListsDataService
All Implemented Interfaces:
ListsDataServiceInterface
@Repository public class ListsDataService extends Object implements ListsDataServiceInterface
Provides the necessary operations for shopping list information.
Version:
1.0
Author:
Gabriel Cepleanu

    • getListsByUser

      public List<ListModel> getListsByUser(int user_id, boolean noItemsService, boolean noCustomItems)
      Returns a list of all shopping list items by User ID.
      Parameters:
      user_id - User ID number
      noItemsService - If true, the list will not contain items
      noCustomItems - If true, the list will not contain custom items
      Returns:
      List of Shopping Lists

      Description copied from interface: ListsDataServiceInterface

    • updateItemPositions

      public boolean updateItemPositions(ItemModel item, int list_id, int newPosition, boolean swap)
      Updates each item position in a given list of item objects The given item will be inserted at newPosition and each item position will be updated sequentially by 1
      Parameters:
      item - Item to be updated
      list_id - List ID to be updated
      newPosition - New position to insert item at
      swap - If enabled, performs swap with item at newPosition instead of insert
      Returns:
      Transaction status

      noItemsService - If true, does not get item names

      List of List Item Objects
